channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:45AM; 1446 W 182nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SZPUkW; Harbor Gateway; KNOCKDOWN:32 LAFD firefighters (plus LA County Fire units) extinguished the fire in both the converted garage and the attic of the single family dwelling in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E285 E38 E64 E79 RA79 RA85 T64 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:28AM; 1446 W 182nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SZPUkW; Harbor Gateway; Fire in a detached, converted garage extended into the attic of the single family dwelling. Firefighters extinguished the fire in the converted garage and are in an offensive operation against the attic fire. LA County Fire Dept is also on scene assisting. No injuries reported. ; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E285 E38 E64 E79 RA79 RA85 T64 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:21AM; 1934 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpE6r5; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 60 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes. The building is updated to a 3 story (2 residential over parking) duplex with one unit on the 3rd floor well involved. One patient (age/gender ?) being transported in unknown condition. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E2 E201 E227 E229 E250 E26 E261 E27 E56 E60 RA27 RA82 RA827 SO1 T1 T27 T29 T50 T61; CH9; 2 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:21AM; 1934 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpE6r5; Los Feliz; Two story fourplex with heavy smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E2 E201 E227 E229 E250 E26 E261 E289 E295 E3 E56 E60 EM18 HR3 RA3 RA82 RA827 SQ95 T1 T27 T29 T50 T61 T89 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:13AM; 1159 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N8jBfK; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 60 firefighters extinguished both the fire in the building of origin and the well involved attic fire in the exposed duplex to the North. The home to the South was defended from fire damage. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E13 E20 E211 E220 E227 E229 E235 E250 E27 E35 E52 E56 E6 E82 EA1 EM11 EM14 EM18 HR3 PI4 RA27 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T27 T29 T35 T50 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:06AM; 1159 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N8jBfK; East Hollywood; Firefighters remain in the defensive mode on the original fire building while crews are in the offensive mode fighting a well established attic fire in the exposed duplex to the North (Delta exposure) and defending the home to the South (Bravo exposure) from extension. No injuries reported.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E220 E227 E229 E235 E250 E27 E35 E52 E56 E6 E82 EM11 EM14 EM18 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T20 T27 T29 T35 T50 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0280; 05:45AM; 1159 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N8jBfK; East Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling (vacant) fully involved with multiple buildings exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode with additional resources requested.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E20 E220 E235 E35 E52 E6 RA35 RA52 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0068; 01:58AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 68 firefighters extinguished the fire which traveled from the 1st to 2nd floor of a two story office building in 58 minutes with no injuries reported. There is extensive overhaul required to ensure no hot spots remain in the insulation above the drop ceiling, etc. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol. No further details. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC13 BC14 BC2 CM40 CM42 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM13 EM14 HR3 RA2 RA20 RA211 RA27 RA3 RA4 RA803 RA804 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0070; 01:58AM; 916 S Victoria Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T5E60D; Mid-Wilshire; KNOCKDOWN: 46 firefighters extinguished a well involved 2 story, single family dwelling in 58 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E13 E215 E226 E229 E26 E261 E29 E37 E61 EM11 RA29 RA61 RA829 T15 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 1 12 15 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0068; 01:46AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; Downtown; This incident is at the Greater Alarm status. The structure is a 25' x 75' office building with fire which traveled from the 1st to 2nd floor. There was a partial floor collapse on the 2nd floor which impacted two firefighters but there are no injuries. Firefighters continue in the offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC13 BC14 BC2 CM40 CM42 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 E95 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA2 RA20 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA804 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T11 T2 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
